2.0.0.en:
Updated discord.js to v14
üí• Breaking: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: `PLAYING` is now `Playing`, `GUILD_TEXT` is now `GuildText`.
üí• Breaking: In raw states all `type` field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types.
Add support for messages from the notification-manager adapter
Updated dependencies
Added Ukrainian translations
Updated translations

1.1.1.en:
Added support for text messages in voice channels
Added support for custom slash commands
Added Blockly support with special custom blocks
Send error replies on slash commands as ephemeral
Added config option to send all slash command replies as ephemeral
Register get/set commands only if states are configured for this
Choices for commands are now handled as autocomplete which allows more choices, is more dynamic and shows the choices only to authorized users
Added command options to `raw.interactionJson` json content
Fixed command name checks
Fixed some crashes / stuck conditions when network is not available
Fixed several small bugs

text.en: Activity types and channel types are now in title case. Example: PLAYING is now Playing, GUILD_TEXT is now GuildText. In raw states all type field values are now numbers representing the internal enum values of the types. Please make sure to check and update your usages of the types after upgrading to version 2.0.0 or newer.
text.de: Aktivit√§tstypen und Kanaltypen sind nun in TitleCase. Beispiel: PLAYING ist jetzt Playing, GUILD_TEXT ist jetzt GuildText. In Rohzust√§nden sind nun alle type-Werte Zahlen, die den internen Enum-Werten der Typen entsprechen. Bitte darauf achten, die Verwenung von Typ-Werten nach dem Upgrade auf Version 2.0.0 oder neuer zu √ºberpr√ºfen und ggf. zu aktualisieren.

Certifique-se de verificar e atualizar seus usos dos tipos ap√≥s atualizar para a vers√£o 2.0.0 ou mais recente.

In rauwe staten zijn alle veldwaarden nu cijfers die de interne waarden van de types vertegenwoordigen. Controleer alsjeblieft en update je gebruik van de types na het upgraden naar versie 2.0 of nieuwer.

Assurez-vous de v√©rifier et de mettre √† jour vos utilisations des types apr√®s la mise √† niveau de la version 2.0.0 ou plus r√©cente.

In stati grezzi tutti i valori di campo di tipo sono ora numeri che rappresentano i valori enum interni dei tipi. Assicuratevi di controllare e aggiornare i vostri usi dei tipi dopo l'aggiornamento alla versione 2.0.0 o pi√π recente.
